001
002package com.commercetools.api.client;
003
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
006
007import com.commercetools.api.models.Versioned;
008import com.commercetools.api.models.extension.Extension;
009import com.commercetools.api.models.extension.ExtensionDraft;
010import com.commercetools.api.models.extension.ExtensionDraftBuilder;
011import com.commercetools.api.models.extension.ExtensionUpdate;
012import com.commercetools.api.models.extension.ExtensionUpdateAction;
013import com.commercetools.api.models.extension.ExtensionUpdateActionBuilder;
014
015public interface ByProjectKeyExtensionsRequestBuilderMixin {
016    public ByProjectKeyExtensionsPost post(ExtensionDraft extensionDraft);
017
018    public ByProjectKeyExtensionsByIDRequestBuilder withId(String ID);
019
020    public default ByProjectKeyExtensionsByIDPost update(Versioned<Extension> extension,
021            List<ExtensionUpdateAction> actions) {
022        return withId(extension.getId())
023                .post(builder -> ExtensionUpdate.builder().version(extension.getVersion()).actions(actions));
024    }
025
026    public default ByProjectKeyExtensionsByIDPost update(Versioned<Extension> extension,
027            UnaryOperator<UpdateActionBuilder<ExtensionUpdateAction, ExtensionUpdateActionBuilder>> op) {
028        return withId(extension.getId()).post(builder -> ExtensionUpdate.builder()
029                .version(extension.getVersion())
030                .actions(op.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(ExtensionUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
031    }
032
033    public default WithUpdateActionBuilder<ExtensionUpdateAction, ExtensionUpdateActionBuilder, ByProjectKeyExtensionsByIDPost> update(
034            Versioned<Extension> extension) {
035        return builder -> withId(extension.getId()).post(b -> ExtensionUpdate.builder()
036                .version(extension.getVersion())
037                .actions(builder.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(ExtensionUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
038    }
039
040    public default ByProjectKeyExtensionsByIDDelete delete(Versioned<Extension> extension) {
041        return withId(extension.getId()).delete().withVersion(extension.getVersion());
042    }
043
044    public default ByProjectKeyExtensionsPost create(ExtensionDraft extensionDraft) {
045        return post(extensionDraft);
046    }
047
048    public default ByProjectKeyExtensionsPost create(UnaryOperator<ExtensionDraftBuilder> op) {
049        return post(op.apply(ExtensionDraftBuilder.of()).build());
050    }
051
052}
